alert.note: Alert for Northern Calcasieu; Northern Jefferson Davis; Southern Calcasieu; Southern Jefferson Davis (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 05 at 9:25AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN JEFFERSON DAVIS AND SOUTHEASTERN CALCASIEU PARISHES THROUGH 1000 AM CDT... At 924 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near Carlyss, or near Sulphur, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Charles, Sulphur, Westlake, Iowa, Lake Charles Regional Airport, Carlyss, Holmwood, and Bell City. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 19 and 45. Interstate 210 between mile markers 1 and 12. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Northern Calcasieu; Northern Jefferson Davis; Southern Calcasieu; Southern Jefferson Davis
